dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4240896V] Intellectual Propery Right/Copyright Violation by The Plan
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2007 12:14 PM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4240896V] Intellectual Propery Right/Copyright Violation by The Planet.com - From Kaneesha.com ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Intellectual Propery Right/Copyright Violation by The Planet.com - From Kaneesha.com Added by system at Wednesday, May 23 2007 05:13 pm X-MailFrom: Hello@kaneesha.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed May 23 17:13:27 2007 Received: (qmail 16586 invoked by alias); 23 May 2007 22:13:26 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 16548 invoked from network); 23 May 2007 22:13:21 -0000 Received: from spooling.theplanet.com (69.56.141.4) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 23 May 2007 22:13:21 -0000 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 23 May 2007 17:13:22 -0500 Received: from [172.16.220.10] (helo=DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) by spooling.theplanet.com (envelope-from Hello@kaneesha.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Hqz56-0001o0-LR for abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net; Wed, 23 May 2007 17:13:20 -0500 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.110]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 23 May 2007 17:12:43 -0500 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 23 May 2007 17:12:43 -0500 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from Hello@kaneesha.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1Hqz4V-0001xi-BM; Wed, 23 May 2007 17:12:43 -0500 Received: from 18.208-65-130.reverse.enterhost.com ([208.65.130.18] helo=webmail.kaneesha.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Hello@kaneesha.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Hqz4T-0003OU-Eh; Wed, 23 May 2007 17:12:41 -0500 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary=----_SmarterMail_NextPart_3618224157285432 Date: Wed, 23 May 2007 17:12:37 -0500 Received: from [72.90.135.8] by webmail.kaneesha.com via HTTP; Wed, 23 May 2007 17:12:37 -0500 Subject: Intellectual Propery Right/Copyright Violation by The Planet.com - From Kaneesha.com From: "Hello - Kaneesha.com" Reply-To: Hello@kaneesha.com To: ,, CC: Message-ID: <21095b77ca0c49a4b5d7b1963f9d544b@kaneesha.com> X-OriginalArrivalTime: 23 May 2007 22:12:43.0723 (UTC) FILETIME=[7C7051B0:01C79D87] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Sir/Madam, We are in the business of ethnic Indian dress designing and selling dresses through our exclusive outlets in USA, India and several parts of the world. After designing of the dresses and apparel to be sold by us, cause photographic images of such products to be created for the purposes of publicity by way of catalogues and on our website etc. The dress designs created by us and the photographic images of such products are the exclusive property of Kaneesha Boutique Inc USA, Kaneesha Boutique India and Kaneesha.com to be utilized by us alone, unless we have expressly licensed others to so utilize them. We own web site Kaneesha.com since 2001 and display the dresses designed by us on this web site. We were shocked to find that many of the designs solely and originally created by us and shown on our website, Kaneesha.com for publicity and as an online catalogue, have been illegally copied and used by India Fashion House, Inderjeet Singh, 50 moti bazar dehradun, Dehradun, Himachal Pradesh,248001, INDIA , on their website indiafashionboutique.com, thereby misrepresenting people into believing that the same have been designed by indiafashionboutique.com. and displayed at www.indiafashionboutique.com, http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/show_product.php?hid=13&id=24&naam=Churidar%20Suits, http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/show_product.php?hid=13&id=25&naam=Embriodered%20Suits, http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/show_product.php?hid=13&id=26&naam=East%20West%20Suits, http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/subcat.php?hid=12&naam=Sarees%20/%20Cholis%20Skirts, http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/show_product_full.php?id=23&hid=12&naam=Lengha%20-%20Cholis, http://! www.indiafashionboutique.com/subcat.php?hid=14&naam=Jewellery, http://www.indiafashionboutique.com/subcat.php?hid=15&naam=Accessories. We were further shocked to find that indiafashionboutique.com have used the designs originally created by us. They have also caused the images to be displayed through indiafashionboutique.com, thereby passing off and/or attempting to pass off the said designs as if they had been created by indiafashionboutique.com. Please note that this misleading action has caused great loss and harm to our name and reputation in the international market, as most of the designs created by us and displayed on our web site have been reproduced by indiafashionboutique.com. Do further note that this action is a gross violation of intellectual property laws by indiafashionboutique.com and/or their associates/partners as indiafashionboutique.com and those concerned with them have attempted to pass off designs created by us as original creations of indiafashionboutique.com. Our products sought to be shown to be as those of indiafashionboutique.com and also as appearing through your web server are as displayed at URLs specified above (we have saved copies of all the pages and can be produced to appropriate legal authority as required). This action constitutes an infringement of our exclusive right on the dresses and our design as well as photographs/images created by us for the purpose of our exclusive use for advertising of the products. The ip address 70.84.175.130 where the site is hosted resolves to your server Theplanet.com. Not only have indiafashionboutique.com infringed the exclusive right in respect of the above but you have also tried to pass of products designed by us as those of their own by allowing them to host illegally downloaded images on your web server. This act in posting images of products designed by us is a violation of our trade designs originally created and designed by a designing team of Kaneesha.com, which is unique to our images. This action is also a violation of the Intellectual Property Right/ Copyright act of Untied States of America and Indian Information Technology Act, 2000. We therefore hereby call upon you to remove/cause to be removed, the above images hosted on your web server within a period of 48 hours of receipt of this notice and inform us of such compliance, failing which you , along with indiafashionboutique.com shall be liable to face legal action and costs of the same shall be at your responsibility. Nimesh Dave President Kaneesha Boutique Inc. 13 Remington Dr Edison NJ 08820 USA Kaneesha Boutique 1 Animesh Bldg. C G Road, Ahmedabad Gujarat India May 22 2007 Following is the registration information of responssible parties against whom we will initiate legal action if our notice is not complied with within 48 hours. OrgName: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. OrgID: TPCM Address: 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Address: Suite 110 City: Dallas StateProv: TX PostalCode: 75207 Country: US NetRange: 70.84.0.0 - 70.87.255.255 CIDR: 70.84.0.0/14 NetName: NETBLK-THEPLANET-BLK-13 NetHandle: NET-70-84-0-0-1 Parent: NET-70-0-0-0-0 NetType: Direct Allocation NameServer: NS1.THEPLANET.COM NameServer: NS2.THEPLANET.COM Comment: RegDate: 2004-07-29 Updated: 2006-02-17 Administrative Contact: Planet, The support@theplanet.com 1333 Stemmons Freeway Suite #110 Dallas, TX 75027 US 214-782-7800 Fax: 214-782-7801 Technical Contact: Planet, The support@theplanet.com 1333 Stemmons Freeway Suite #110 Dallas, TX 75027 US 214-782-7800 Fax: 214-782-7801 Registrars. Whois Server: whois.theplanet.com Registrant: The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 1333 Stemmons Freeway Suite #110 Dallas, TX 75027 US MIME element (text/html)

Dear Sir/Madam,
